duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure timely filing of Currency Transaction Reports (CTRs), Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs), and other BSA recordkeeping requirements.
Conduct monitoring of client activity to identify instances requiring additional reporting/review.
Provide training and act as the Bank’s Subject Matter Expert for associates regarding BSA Compliance Program.
Complete enhanced due diligence on identified customers, assess overall risk, and document findings.
Analyze high-risk customer accounts for unusual and suspicious activity.
Attend BSA training sessions as directed by management.
Assist in the daily responsibilities of managing the Bank’s BSA/AML and OFAC Compliance Program.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 2-3 years of banking experience. High school diploma or general education degree.
